name: Jalisco Flower from Copa D'Oro
description: While he doesn't believe in strict recipes and is happy to create a bespoke punch catering to customers' tastes, Vincenzo Marianella of Copa D'Oro in Los Angeles often recommends this light and delicate punch as an introduction to tequila.
recipeIngredient: 10 ounces freshly squeezed ruby red grapefruit juice

recipeInstructions.text: Combine tequila, St. Germain, and ruby red grapefruit juice in bowl (can be combined in advance and kept covered in refrigerator).
When ready to serve, add cubes of ice and Prosecco. Garnish with grapefruit slices and mint leaves.
